    Function reference

    All functions

    breaks_divMult()
    Compute breaks for ratio scale
    divMult_trans()
    Natural log transformation... providing breaks on the "divMult" scale
    exch
    USD-CAD exchange rate in first two COVID pandemic years
    label_centiNel()
    100x Natural log (centinel) transformation of breaks
    label_divMult()
    Ratio labels
    label_nel()
    Natural log (nel) transformation of breaks
    label_percDiff()
    Scale breakpoints based on percentage difference from reference
    label_propDiff()
    Scale breakpoints based on percentage difference from reference
    limit_breaks()
    Truncate log-scaled axis breaks to data range
    nel_trans()
    Natural log transformation... providing breaks on the "nel" scale
    nel_vid
    NY Times COVID case data for mid-Atlantic USA in first two pandemic years, with additional columns
    propDiff_trans()
    Natural log transformation... showing proportional change explicitly
    scale_y_ratio() scale_x_ratio()
    Ratio-based position scales for continuous data (x & y)
    split_decades()
    Split stingy limit_breaks into three parts per complete decade
    vid
    NY Times COVID case data for mid-Atlantic USA in first two pandemic years
